title: Add 'run example' to build.xml
description: Working in eclipse, I find it really convenient for debugging/testing to have a 'run-example' target in the build file. Anyone else?

comments.author: Tricia Jenkins
comments.content: Running the example is something I frequently do so having it in the ant script is something I'd find useful.

comments.author: Erik Hatcher
comments.content:
Thanks Mark!   I've always hacked something like this in to projects for easy running.  I refined it a little, making it possible to launch with a different Solr home and data directory:

   ant run-example -Dexample.solr.home=.... -Dexample.data.dir=....
